name: gusplease
text: Fuckin'

name: centipede_damascus
text: A comment left by centipede_damascus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ocarinak, NaughtyByN8ture, Latterman, rhymesforkids, robbingdog, farqussus, Afkpuz, agentstinky, cailetshadow, empy)

name: gompo
text: I'd love to have an enlarged, poster-sized version of that picture to hang on the sorts of walls which need to remind people of fuckin', such as spaceships and boardrooms.

name: unquotable
text: I need it

name: overmedicated
text: Try Santa Cruz.

name: unquotable
text: I live in Santa Cruz, you won't find no sign like that. What you will find is gum disease, expensive coffee, and stink.

name: mustakrakesh
text: Since when do you get gum disease from fuckin'?

name: blarghamagarky
text: I have thought of this also and relayed the idea to my achewood reading friends (who I will live with shortly) and I'm thinking I might just have to make it happen (in our living room) by means of my own craftiness.

name: mercuri0us
text: Or a champagne room

name: kickstart
text: No matter what a sign stolen from a cartoon cat's spaceship tells you, there is NO SEX in the Champagne Room.

name: radishes
text: Fuckin' is one of the main reasons that I went from a usually-reader to an always-reader. Where is the Fuckin' merch in the store??

name: lawbot
text: With hindsight we see that Pat was overcompensating for his homosexuality with this decoration.

name: luckypyjamas
text:
it could be that he wasn't gay yet.

assuming he had built this rocket before he turned 26.

name: lawbot
text: Good point. You better research that, then come back and tell us the results.

name: luckypyjamas
text:
based on when they attended high school, i would say that beef, ray and pat are around 26-28

This comic has the year 1992 in reference to the senior pictures of a girl they knew in high school

you figure, if they were 18 when the graduated, and they graduated in '92, '93, or '94, that puts them at 28, 29, or 30 in 2002.

which means:

pat was gay

so your hypothesis is likely

name: falseprophet
text: You have already received a fat research chubby, so I made sure you got a Turgid Investigative Journalism Chubby%u2122.

name: falseprophet
text: Damn you, assetbar. That's supposed to be a (TM) in superscript, by the way.

name: lawbot
text: I respect your decision to actually do this.

name: relaxing
text:
http://achewood.com/index.php?date=04222004
Based on the dates in this strip, I had put their high school graduation around 1996.

This could mean that Pat was not yet gay.

name: luckypyjamas
text: please explain further

name: trevor328
text:
The strip mentions Ray having mix tapes of Alanis Morissette in High School. She didn't release a well-known album until 1995, so 1996 would be a reasonable graduation year.

This means that Pat could have been as young as 24 when he built the ship and, therefore, not homosexual.

You also must consider that Onstad undoubtedly has no fucking clue what his characters are going to do in the future. At the time he created this strip he was completely unaware of the transformation that would occur to Pat.

name: sirfrederick
text: Beef might have invented the Alanis tapes as an anachronistic example of the sort of mix tapes Ray made.

name: relaxing
text:
OH MY FUCK if we cannot take everything written in a dialog bubble as the ABSOLUTE LITERAL TRUTH, WHAT CAN WE TRUST?!?

(which is my way of saying yeah man, good point.)

name: nice-on-water
text:
http://achewood.com/index.php?date=08262008
5 months late. What.

name: falseprophet
text: That, and what man who is secure in his heterosexuality needs more than 500 hours of free AOL?

name: tekende
text: The kind of man who wants to use AOL to look up porn.

name: deusoma
text: Gay or not, that REALLY doesn't seem like the sort of thing Pat would decorate a room with, even if that room was two hundred thousand miles away from anyone he knew.

name: billyamericana
text: In space, no one wants AOL. Lot like here, actually.

name: ghostd
text: Pat doesn't like craisins, but will gladly eat cranberries and raisins. What's the deal?

name: darthemed
text: He probably considers Craisins to be poser imitations of the real thing, and thus unworthy of his time and jaws.

name: lawbot
text: Even worse are the cranberries that you get which have been artificially orange flavoured. Even thinking about them is making me angry.

name: lateadopter
text: Craisins are sweetened with refined sugar.  No vegan would eat them.

name: cracklewater
text:
Vegans don't eat refined sugar? Where's the animal-oppressing system involved in that?

I mean, I know vegans who don't eat sugar (or wheat, or soy, or fucking anything), but I thought they were unusual even for veguloids.

Hell, I was raised vegetarian, but I find veganism weird. Cheese is one of life's great pleasures, along with Fuckin'.

name: mashisoyo
text: The sugar refining process involves some bones, or something like that. I heard that.

name: havenless
text: In space, no one can hear you scream. Except AOL.

name: chrisb
text: It would seem more likely Pat would display a poster of two persons engaging in intercourse with a line through it.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Aren't craisins the same thing as dried cranberries?

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: A comment left by everything_is_a_hat was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Deusoma, fancypants, cailetshadow)

name: deusoma
text: Perhaps the curse hasn't kicked in yet.

name: dovey
text: See above!

name: someone3
text: man i need that for my house, hang it in my bathroom freak out my friends.

name: deancain29
text: I find the 'fuckin' picture suspicious

name: steerpike66
text: Nobody wants hateful, useless, pernicious free AOL. Free AOL is like free wedgies.

name: catgrl131
text: Oh boy! Free wedgies!?

name: kronski
text: The Fuckin' poster could also double as a mudflap.

name: myrmidon101
text: BEEP

name: gormster
text: What the hell? This space ship is like the dang TARDIS.

name: dasilodavi
text:
http://m.assetbar.com/achewood/uuagMJvnp

"I don't dig on craisins."
Then why the fuck are they in his spaceship?!? The mind reels!

name: luckyg
text: He probably read an article where Bono was talking about how much he loved Craisins.

name: phy
text: No matter where you are, or how far you run, they are always there first. They will ALWAYS find you. And they will give you a CD you will not use.

name: geysershitdick
text: The things I would do for a "Fuckin'" poster.

name: hughnin
text: Man they should use aol as some form of corporal punishment, judge hands down the decree of six years of aol. Harsh man, harsh.

name: vymora
text: The footprints seem to indicate that during all this time on the moon Roast Beef has only ventured outside once.

name: drskradley
text: Don't blame him, really. What's there to see? It's THE MOON. Once you get past the awesomeness of low gravity and the fact that you can do Shoryukens , all you have left is the moon. And that ain't much.

name: relaxing
text: The drawing and script on the Fuckin' poster remind me of the Perry Bible Fellowship.

name: aki
text: It looks remarkably like the PBF strip Eden , in line and such.

name: charchar
text: I've had astronaut ice cream; it was like compressed Nesquik that dissolved into goo.  Good times in Atlanta.

name: jthm_guitarist
text: The whole time he was on the moon he only wrote 'java'?

name: evilernieuk
text: last two panels are priceless.

name: tttt2
text: lame punchline but the Fuckin' picture warrants a 4

name: ctrl_z
text: Fived for "Fukin'"

name: chexmix
text: Somehow the style of the "F" in "Fuckin'" makes the fact that the "Fuckin'" poster makes this strip funny.

name: milo
text: fived if only for the alt text

name: milo
text: fived if only for the alt text
